Intro.Short: I am a Computer Science Graduate from Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University Uttar Pradesh.
Intro.Long: I am having 2.5+ years of experience in IT industries and contributed in each phase of development lifecycle which helped my current organization to deliver products on time. I enjoy being challenged and engaging with projects that require me to work outside my comfort and knowledge set, as continuing to learn new languages and development techniques are important to me and for the success of the organization.

Responsibilities: Create angular based components, services and modals supporting multiple themes.
Update all the dependent microservices and publish nugets using different tools for build and release.
Write unit test cases for frontend and service layer.
Analyse the moscow and prepare tech approach for the implementation
Created .Net Core Microservices with complete Dev/Prod Release and Build Pipelines.
Worked on every stage of development (Design, Implementation, Testing, deployment).
Interacted with clients in a daily stand ups and gathered requirements.
Worked with Continuous Integration Methodology and DevOps.
Performed Load Testing for the Web API over multiple platforms.
Created custom visual using d3.js for PowerBI and Web Applications.
MCSA Certified and also Completed Microsoft's certification on SQL, Power BI, Azure.
Created design documents for the new PBIs and fixed the dev and prod build failures.
Worked on Recommendation Engine, Business Rules, GDPR, ML POCs.
Wrote Unit, smoke and integration tests and also wrote front end test cases using jasmine and karma framework.
Developed an android application for the Jeev Aashraya (a Lucknow based NGO).
It has an user friendly interface and helps user to directly connect to the Jeev Ashraya.
It has features like Goggle map routes, Google signin, NewsFeed, Localization etc.
